commands.command: sh -lc "if (grep -q '"react-native-macos"' package.json 2>/dev/null || [ -d node_modules/react-native-macos ] || [ -d ../node_modules/react-native-macos ]) && [ -d macos ]; then npx react-native run-macos; else echo 'react-native run-macos not configured: add react-native-macos and initialize the macos/ native project (see https://microsoft.github.io/react-native-macos/).'; fi"

sh -lc "if (grep -q '"react-native-windows"' package.json 2>/dev/null || [ -d node_modules/react-native-windows ] || [ -d ../node_modules/react-native-windows ]) && [ -d windows ]; then npx react-native run-windows; else echo 'react-native run-windows not configured: add react-native-windows and initialize the windows/ native project (see https://microsoft.github.io/react-native-windows/).'; fi"

sh -lc "if (grep -q '"react-native-macos"' package.json 2>/dev/null || [ -d node_modules/react-native-macos ] || [ -d ../node_modules/react-native-macos ]) && [ -d macos ]; then npx react-native build-macos; else echo 'react-native build-macos not configured: add react-native-macos and initialize the macos/ native project.'; fi"

sh -lc "if (grep -q '"react-native-windows"' package.json 2>/dev/null || [ -d node_modules/react-native-windows ] || [ -d ../node_modules/react-native-windows ]) && [ -d windows ]; then npx react-native build-windows; else echo 'react-native build-windows not configured: add react-native-windows and initialize the windows/ native project.'; fi"
echo 'Installing react-native-macos into @poliverai/poliverai (this will modify package.json). Run this locally:'
echo '  cd apps/poliverai && yarn add react-native-macos@latest'
echo 'After install run native setup instructions: https://microsoft.github.io/react-native-macos/'
echo 'Installing react-native-windows into @poliverai/poliverai (this will modify package.json). Run this locally:'
echo '  cd apps/poliverai && yarn add react-native-windows@latest'
echo 'After install run native setup instructions: https://microsoft.github.io/react-native-windows/'
